msContents.summary: Register for payment of the syntaximon; entries are recorded daily and list name, patronymic and amount paid

msItemStruct.note: Written across the fibers; recto published as P.Princ. 7
Two columns: col. I, 28 lines; col. II, 22 lines; broken at both sides and at top?
The hand is a small, rapid cursive; the same scribe wrote P.Princ. 1-6 and P. Cornell 21

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
